General_Description: '''The Belladonna Kiss''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: On a [[message board]], Kassandra found a note about a contract: "[[Athens|Athenians]] feast on our crops. Make them fear what they eat. [[Poison]] them to them [sic] make fear our food."
Section_Outcome: Kassandra killed Athenian [[soldier]]s using poison and [[Staff|staves]], and destroyed their resource crates all over [[Greece]], gaining rewards for doing this.
Section_Behind_the_scenes: The name of the memory references the highly toxic plant {{Wiki|Atropa belladonna|belladonna}}, also known as deadly nightshade.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
